name: Paddle Balls
description:
Can you beat the hi-score?

A different take on old-school Pong!

Paddle Balls is a fun, pong like, arcade game that takes gravity into effect. Adding extra play-ability with different outcomes each play.

Play this new paddle ball game!

How to Play:
Slide finger left and right to move paddle. Double tap to teleport to location. Collect coins to use in the store to purchase new paddles. Keep balls bouncing!

List of Features:
- Two game modes to play!
Solo: the normal version where you spawn with five lives and collect power-ups bouncing multiple balls.
Skill Check: you only have one life and only bouncing one ball. However, your paddle is a lot smaller. Good Luck!
- Google Play Game Services
- Leaderboards, Global and Friends
- Item shop with different paddles to buy
- InApp Purchases to get more coins
- Background Music
- Sound Effects
- Bouncing balls
- Power-ups
- Extra Life's
- Settings page
